LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_BanditScarf.label: bandit scarf
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_BanditScarf.description: A scarf worn over the face to conceal one's identity. Due to it's association with outlaws, this scarf will hinder social impact.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_DesperadoHat.label: desperado hat
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_DesperadoHat.description: A stylish and elegant hat that is soft to the touch. Especially popular amongst outlaws, card cheats, and otherwise slippery individuals.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_PaddyHat.label: paddy hat
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_PaddyHat.description: Traveling merchants and rice paddy farmers would often protect themselves from the sun with hats like these. It has very oriental feel to it.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_TopHat.label: top hat
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_TopHat.description: An elegant hat which gives the wearer a sophisticated look of importance. Improves social impact.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_FeatheredTopHat.label: feathered top hat
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_FeatheredTopHat.description: A striking feathered hat that has an air of grandeur. Improves social impact.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Kepi.label: kepi
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Kepi.description: The most important piece of many a rebel army uniform. Designed to be worn on hot climates.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Spectacles.label: spectacles
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Spectacles.description: A pair of eyeglasses that make the user look slightly more intelligent. Can also improve vision.
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Sombrero.label: sombrero
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Sombrero.description: Keeps the sun off your eyes during siesta! Ay caramba!
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Zorro.label: wanderer's hat and mask
LanguageData.RWP_Apparel_Zorro.description: This apparel is fashioned after the famed hat used by the legendary vigilante El Fox - 'En garde, noble foe! You cannot avoid justice- The vigilante justice!'
